descriptionHtml:
Ever wondered why circlets are so heavy? Ever dropped valuable(ish) circlets just because they weight 2 units? Yeah me too. Surprisingly I didn't find a mod for this on Nexus so here's one, as simple as it can be. All enchanted and non-enchanted circlets, including mage's circlet now weight only 0.5 units, and the Diadem of the Savant weights 1.0. For Dawnguard users, Aetherium crown now also weights 1.0.

So there you go, that's all this mod does. Hope you enjoy it, I know I do! Endorse and vote for file of the month ;)



Don't know how to install? No worries, I will tell you how! If you have Nexus Mod Manager, just click download with manager, and then in the manager activate the mod and you're good to go! But if you want to install manually, you need to navigate to your \Steam\steamapps\common\skyrim\Data folder and drop the esp in there and activate it in Skyrim launcher (or NMM).

But only download and activate one file! If you have Dawnguard, download the file that says Dawnguard. If you don't have Dawnguard, download the one that says Vanilla.
author: Kuunkulta
